data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Latehar, Jharkhand, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Latehar, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Latehar, Jharkhand, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Latehar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 710,182 who are far from you in Latehar, Jharkhand, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Kawar people.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Latehar do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Latehar words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Latehar, Jharkhand, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

location.name: Latehar
location.people_groups_list: Korwa, Sauntia, Panika, Nagarchi (Hindu traditions), Agariya (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Korwa (448,000), Sauntia (82,000), Panika (1,050,000), Nagarchi (Hindu traditions) (149,000), Agariya (Hindu traditions) (205,000)
